title: Emma: A Victorian Romance Season 2
alternative_title: Eikoku Koi Monogatari Emma: Molders-hen, 英國戀物語エマ ～メルダース編～
description: It's been a month since Emma left London and reluctantly ending her relationship with William Jones, due to their difference in class status. She has found a new job, and a fresh start, as one of the many maids working in the Molders family estate. Her presence soon catches the eye and respect of sullen but kind-hearted footman Hans. Meanwhile, Eleanor Campbell makes her move to win William's heart. However, Emma and William have yet to realise that they will meet again.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
